title: Evil Mommy forces tot-son into 300 hospital visits, 13 life threatening surgeries, feeding tube and wheelchair, ALL FAKE
itunes:title: Evil Mommy forces tot-son into 300 hospital visits, 13 life threatening surgeries, feeding tube and wheelchair, ALL FAKE
description:
A Texas mom says her son is sick, taking him to over 300 hospital visits. He endures 13 surgeries. Doctors say the boy is perfectly healthy. Nancy Grace discusses the Munchausen by Proxy diagnosis: Psychologist Dr. Brian Russell, Defense Attorney Jason Oshins, Former detective Steven Lampley and Crime Online Investigative reporter Levi Page.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
